wcProducts.name: Devias Kit Pro - Client and Admin Dashboard
wcProducts.description:
This is a professional Next.js and Vite React template that comes with plenty of ready-to-use Material UI components. The components have been developed with one common goal in mind: to help you build faster and more beautiful applications. Each component is fully customizable, responsive, and easy to integrate.

For technical questions, you can live chat with developers on the official Devias Discord server.

If you are looking for Create-React-App, see this quick guide on how to migrate.

Devias Kit Pro - Next.js v14.1 | Vite

  • NEW - Next.js v14.1 App Router version
  • NEW - Vite version
  • NEW - Starter versions
  • NEW - Screens (Academy, Crypto, File Manager, Logistics, etc). See more on our changelog
  • NEW - Design system aesthetics
  • 60+Page examples
  • 85 Individual components
  • Custom authentication
  • AWS Cognito/Amplify authentication
  • Auth0 authentication
  • Firebase authentication
  • Supabase authentication
  • Forms built with React Hook Form
  • Schemas validated with Zod
  • Charts built with Recharts
  • Drag and Drop with Dnd Kit
  • RTL support
  • i18n support
  • Mapbox integrated
  • Animations created with Framer Motion
  • ProseMirror text editor with TipTap
  • Sonner toaster
  • Phosphor icons
  • Built with React Hooks API
  • React Context API as State Manager
  • Fully responsive
  • Ready-to-deploy folder structure
  • Complete User Flows

Previous 6.4.2 version deployments

  • Documentation

meta_data.value:
## v7.0.0

###### Feb 26, 2024

- Add `Supabase` auth support
- Improve Next.js `RSC` support
- Refactor and simplify project code
- Reimplement existing auth providers
- Remove `lodash`
- Remove `prop-types`
- Replace `apexcharts` with `recharts`
- Replace `date-fns` with `dayjs`
- Replace `formik` with `react-hook-form`
- Replace `numeral` with native `Intl.NumberFormat`
- Replace `react-beatuiful-dnd` with `dnd-kit`
- Replace `react-hot-toast` with `sonner`
- Replace `react-quill` with `tiptap`
- Replace `react-slick` with `embla-carousel`
- Replace `redux` with `React Context`
- Replace `untitled-ui` icons with `phosphor` icons
- Replace `yup` with `zod`
- Replace Next.js `pages` with `app router`
- Update dependencies
- Update design
- Update eslint and prettier config

## v6.4.2
 
###### Jul 6, 2023

- Change external style import strategy
- Fix `Next.js` app router root layout metadata
- Fix `Next.js` app router `Cypress` integration issue
- Fix `Vite` `Draft.js` import issue
- Update dependencies

###### Jul 6, 2023

- Add `prettier` dependecy and format code
- Fix outlined text field style
- Fix `Next.js` app router theme change
- Fix `Next.js` app router nprogress
- Update dependencies

###### May 16, 2023

- Migrate `Create-React-App` (CRA) to `Vite`
- Update dependencies

- Update `Dashboard Overview` page
- Update `design system` aesthetics

- Update dependencies
- Update Sketch files to v5

## v5.0.2
###### Nov 04, 2021

- Reduce compile time
- Update layout strategy

## v5.0.1
###### Nov 03, 2021

- Fix auth guard redirect bug

## v5.0.0
###### Nov 02, 2021

- Migrate CRA to Next.js 12
- Migrate code to MUI v5
- Add Company Details pages
- Add Job Create flow
- Add Job Listing page
- Add Logistics Dashboard page
- Cleanup code
- Remove react-modal-image dependency
- Update Account pages
- Update Blog Platform page designs
- Update Calendar app layout
- Update Chat app layout
- Update Chat logic
- Update Customer Details page
- Update Customer List filters
- Update Invoice List filters
- Update Invoice List page layout
- Update Kaban app
- Update Landing page
- Update Mail app layout
- Update Order List filters
- Update Order List page layout
- Update Product List filters

## v4.1.0
###### May 24, 2021

- Add Sketch and Figma dark versions
- Fix Calendar App Date data type stored in Redux state warning
- Fix Kanban App card move bug
- Fix RTL bug
- Fix nprogress display bug
- Implement mocked api clients instead of mocked axios interceptors
- Remove axios and axios mock adapter dependencies
- Replace Hidden component with sx logic
- Update MUI and other dependencies

## v4.0.0
###### Mar 17, 2021

- Add `@emotion/react` and `@emotion/styled` dependencies for Material-UI v5.
- Add `AWS Amplify` auth platform
- Add `Google Tag Manager` to implement tags concept
- Add support for React strict mode
- Add `gray-matter` dependency
- Add `react-i18next` dependency to implement multi-language
- Add `stylis` and `stylis-plugin-rtl` dependencies for right-to-left support
- Add `web-vitals` dependency
- Add new components
- Add new pages
- Drop IE 11 support
- Fix some TypeScript definitions
- Leverage the `sx` prop where needed
- Regroup pages
- Remove `Google Analytics`
- Remove `js-cookie` dependency
- Remove `jsonwebtoken` dependency
- Remove `jwt-decode` dependency
- Remove `lodash` dependency
- Remove `mdx` dependency
- Remove `react-chartjs-2` dependency
- Remove `uuid` dependency
- Rename components for simpler folder structure
- Replace `moment` with `date-fns` for date parsing
- Replace `react-chartjs-2` with `react-apexcharts`
- Replace `react-helmet` with `react-helmet-async` dependency
- Replace `useStyles` with `experimentalStyled` strategy
- Update `@fullcalendar` dependency
- Upgrade `@material-ui/core` and `@material-ui/icons` dependencies from v4 to v5-alpha.
- Upgrade `react-router` to v6
- Update existing components to match Material-UI v5
- Update theme to use Material-UI v5 theme format

## v3.1.0
###### Aug 1, 2020

### JavaScript

- JavaScript version is now in sync with the TypeScript version, both with the same features.
### TypeScript

No changes.

## v3.0.0
###### July 26, 2020

The release introduces a new version of the product written in TypeScript.

## JavaScript

No changes.

### TypeScript

- Implement Auth0 and FirebaseAuth
- Fix server-side rendering issue with SettingsProvider
- Improve components
- Reimplement JWT Auth using Redux Context API
- Reimplement Redux using Redux Toolkit
- Remove a few components Social application to be able to add new ones in future updates
- Update Calendar and Chat applications
- Update dependencies
- Update Login and Register views
- Update mocked data to match the types
- Update Projects application

## v2.0.0
###### Apr 10, 2020

- Refactor components to accept multi-theme
- Update typography
- Update all views implementing new features
- Update the mock adapter, now accepting post requests
- Add new views
- Implement AuthService and AuthGuard
- Implement multiple themes
- Implement app settings manager
- Implement Redux in Chat, Kanban, Mail apps
- Implement MDX for docs
- Remove multiple CSS classes and replaced the styling with Box component
- Add `react-modal-image` dependency to be able to open images as modals
- Add `formik` dependency to create complex forms
- Add `joy` dependency to validate forms
- Add `notistack` dependency to control notifications
- Add `immer` dependency to create drafts
- Add `apexcharts` dependency to create extra charts

## v1.3.0
###### Sep 7, 2019

#### New

- Add Material-UI Container component to each view to replace custom styling
- Add IE11 support, can be removed from `src/index.js` to reduce bundle size
- Add component pages
- Update code style to match with Airbnb style
- Add right-to-left support
- Add dependencies
  - `eslint-config-airbnb`
  - `eslint-config-prettier`
  - `eslint-plugin-import`
  - `eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y`
  - `eslint-plugin-react-hooks`
- Update depdendecy versions
  - `@date-io/core` ^1.3.6 -> ^1.3.11
  - `@date-io/moment` ^1.3.6 -> ^1.3.11
  - `@fullcalendar/core` ^4.2.0 -> ^4.3.1
  - `@fullcalendar/daygrid` ^4.2.0 -> ^4.3.0
  - `@fullcalendar/interaction` ^4.2.0 -> ^4.3.0
  - `@fullcalendar/list` ^4.2.0 -> ^4.3.0
  - `@fullcalendar/react` ^4.2.0 -> ^4.3.0
  - `@fullcalendar/timegrid` ^4.2.0 -> ^4.3.0
  - `@fullcalendar/timeline` ^4.2.0 -> ^4.3.0
  - `@material-ui/core` ^4.2.0 -> ^4.6.0
  - `@material-ui/icons` ^4.2.1 -> ^4.5.1
  - `@material-ui/lab` ^4.0.0-alpha.19 -> ^4.0.0-alpha.31
  - `@material-ui/pickers` ^3.1.2 -> ^3.2.7
  - `@material-ui/styles` ^4.2.0 -> ^4.6.0
  - `chartjs` ^2.7.3 -> ^2.9.2
  - `draft-js` ^0.11.0 -> ^0.11.2
  - `history` ^4.7.2 -> ^4.10.1
  - `js-cookie` ^2.2.0 -> ^2.2.1
  - `node-sass` ^4.11.0 -> ^4.13.0
  - `prop-types` ^15.7.1 -> ^15.7.2
  - `react` ^16.8.6 -> ^16.11.0
  - `react-beautiful-dnd` ^11.0.4 -> ^11.0.5
  - `react-big-calendar` ^0.22.0 -> ^0.22.1
  - `react-chartjs-2` ^2.7.4 -> ^2.8.0
  - `react-dom` ^16.8.6 -> ^16.11.0
  - `react-dropzone` ^10.1.5 -> ^10.1.10
  - `react-markdown` ^4.0.8 -> ^4.2.2
  - `react-paginate` ^6.3.0 -> ^6.3.2
  - `react-redux` ^7.1.0 -> ^7.1.3
  - `react-router` ^5.0.1 -> ^5.1.2
  - `react-router-config` ^5.0.1 -> ^5.1.1
  - `react-router-dom` ^5.0.1 -> ^5.1.2
  - `react-scripts` ^3.0.1 -> ^3.2.0
  - `uuid` ^3.3.2 -> ^3.3.3
  - `eslint` ^5.16.0 -> ^6.6.0
  - `eslint-plugin-prettier` ^3.0.1 -> ^3.1.1
  - `eslint-plugin-react` ^7.12.4 -> ^7.16.0
  - `prettier` ^1.17.1 -> ^1.19.1

#### Fix

- Fix a bug for Edge & Safari where users couldn't scroll properly

#### Breaking changes

- As we mentioned, we updated code style so you'll note some changes
- Update the layouts to fix scroll issues
- Remove deep folder nesting to keep a clearer structure
- Replace custom `useReact` hook with `useLocation`, `useHistory` and `useParams` from `react-router`
- With `react-scripts@^3.2.0` we are now able to use `'.'` as `baseUrl` and we updated the imports to avoid confusion

## v1.2.0
###### Aug 7, 2019

#### New

- Replace the Routing System from `1.1.0` version with an easier solution to avoid complexity
- Create 3 individual layouts for `Error`, `Auth` and `Dashboard` pages
- Add `axios` and `axios-mock-adapter` modules to simulate server calls for fetch requests
- Rename few components
- Update `Calendar` page code
- Update `Chat` page code
- Update `Error` page code
- Moved all lib mixins to `mixins` folder
- Moved `helpers` files to `utils` folder
- Remove `data.js` files
- Remove unused helpers
- Remove unused utils

#### Fix

- Fix navigation expand issue

## v1.1.1
###### Aug 1, 2019

#### Fix

- Temporary remove PerfectScrollBar to fix Navbar and content scroll issues

## v1.1.0
###### Jul 31, 2019

#### New

- Implement Code Splitting to lazy load views
- Implement Layout System based on Route settings
- Implement Routing System
- Implement Route Authorization Guard based on authenticated user role and route settings
- Update Presentation Page
- Create Changelog Page
- Create Development Documentation Pages
- Add PrismJS library and created CodeBlock component
- Add Redux library and configured some components using it as state manager
- Add design Figma source file
- Update dependencies

#### Fix

- Fix scroll bugs
- The layouts were similary so we kept one Layout only that can be configured dynamically

#### Breaking changes

- Replace `underscore` with `lodash`
- Change the Layout logic
- Rename few components
- Update folder structure, grouped all views in the same folder

## v1.0.0
###### Jul 20, 2019

Initial release
